lab4

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab4.Student

  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the student object and its fields, constructors, and getters/setters.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Student()
      Default constructor for student that initializes the student balance at 0.0.
      Student(java.lang.String fName, java.lang.String ID, char studentGender, int studentAge, boolean isLiveOnCampus) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAge()
      gets the student's age
      double getBalance()
      gets the balance of the student's 49er account
      java.lang.String getFirstName()
      gets the student's first name
      char getGender()
      gets the student's gender
      boolean getLiveOnCampus()
      gets whether student lives on campus
      java.lang.String getStudentId()
      gets the student's id number
      void payFromCard(double amount)
      withdraws money from the student's 49er account and if the param amount is greater the amount in the student's account, it prints an error statement
      void setAge(int studentAge)
      sets the student's age
      void setFirstName(java.lang.String fName)
      sets the student's first name
      void setGender(char studentGender)
      sets the student's gender
      void setLiveOnCampus(boolean isLiveOnCampus)
      sets either true or false for whether the student lives on campus
      void setStudentId(java.lang.String ID)
      sets the student's id number
      void transferToCard(double amount)
      transfers money to the student's 49er account and if the param amount is negative, it returns an error

      • transferToCard

        public void transferToCard(double amount)
        transfers money to the student's 49er account and if the param amount is negative, it returns an error
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of money to be transferred to the student's 49er balance

      • payFromCard

        public void payFromCard(double amount)
        withdraws money from the student's 49er account and if the param amount is greater the amount in the student's account, it prints an error statement
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of money to be withdrawn from the student's 49er balance
